The Requisition contains information about project's needs and details of a new position (skills needed, the newcomer's location, etc.).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the Requisition is approved, it becomes possible to create a New Profile Request based on the Requisition.
